tooltip.output_name: The file name without an extension.
tooltip.resolution:
LR2SD is designed to run at 256x256, but it also works fine up to 512x512.
beatoraja’s intended resolution is 720p.
tooltip.fps: Use 30 fps to ensure playback on LR2SD.
tooltip.buffer: An appropriate buffer size is required to ensure playback on LR2.
tooltip.mux: Increase it until no buffer underflow occurs.
tooltip.mux_auto: When enabled, the entered MUX rate is used as the starting value.

msg.invalid_input: Input file path or output folder path is invalid!
msg.searching_mux: [#{itr}] Searching for a suitable MUX rate... ({mux}k)
msg.done_underflow: Conversion complete! (Final file size: {size}, underflow occurred!)
